title: 981 The 4 Ways to Master Your Mind During Tough Times
description:
On today's 5-minute Friday, Lewis acknowledges the tough moment we're facing in the world and gives actionable advice on how to use this time to set yourself for future success.

- Brene Brown teaches you how to create true belonging and heal the world: https://lewishowes.com/536

- David Goggins on mastering your mind and defying the odds: https://lewishowes.com/715
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
